```{r, echo = F}
pdf2png <- function(path) {
  # only do the conversion for non-LaTeX output
  if (knitr::is_latex_output())
    return(path)
  path2 <- xfun::with_ext(path, "png")
  img <- magick::image_read_pdf(path)
  magick::image_write(img, path2, format = "png")
  path2
}
```
